EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.North Customer Cocktail Reception Confirmat
EmailTemplate.subject: Customer Appreciation Night at SpringOne Platform | Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Customer Appreciation Night hosted by Pivotal on September 25th during SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> in Washington D.C.
Date: Tuesday, September 25, 2018
Time:
7:00PM to 9:00PM
Location: Flight Deck at the Capital Wheel National Harbor, Maryland 20745 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/The+Capital+Wheel/@38.7856314,-77.019161,15z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0x3a441011509144cf!8m2!3d38.7856314!4d-77.019161]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team Event Details <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/Customer-Appreciation-S1P-2018.html]]>
